articles.description: A BCCI official has stated as provided Rohit Sharma steps away from white-ball cricket after the World Cup 2023, India has its next captain ready and in line to take over. | Cricket
articles.content: When Rohit Sharma succeeded Virat Kohli to become India's next captain, he had two targets in mind the T20 World Cup 2022 in Australia and the 50-over World Cup at home in 2023. But a year later all … [+2261 chars]
